title: Wine Country Escape in the Heart of the Hunter Valley
description: Leave city life behind and discover the serene beauty and vibrant rolling hills of the striking Hunter Valley wine region, brimming with gourmet delights and stunning vineyards. Find an apartment-style oasis in Pokolbin-located in the heart of New South Wales’ best wine region-staying at Oaks Cypress Lakes Resort. Includes daily buffet breakfast, a wine and cellar door experience at Brokenwood Wines - the 2019 Cellar Door of the Year, AU$50 food and beverage credit and 15% off sessions at the 18-hole, on-site championship golf course.

title: Tuscan-Style Luxury in the Heart of the Hunter Valley
description: Indulge in a two-night escape with your special someone at the award-winning four-star Estate Tuscany in the heart of the Hunter Valley. Stamped with a TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence and home to a restaurant that was the 2017 winner of the Australian Good Food Guide Reader’s Choice Award, the estate is set amongst 26 acres of gorgeous countryside. Experience the best of Hunter wine country from this luxurious Tuscan-style accommodation and enjoy daily breakfast, canapés at Brokenback Bar on your arrival day, two $30 credit towards dinner at the esteemed The Mill restaurant, a late 12pm checkout and complimentary Wi-Fi.
offer_address: Mistletoe Ln & Hermitage Rd, Pokolbin NSW 2320

title: Brand New Tranquil Hunter Valley Studios with Breakfast, Cellar Door Tastings & Dining Credit
description:
Embrace the serenity of the Hunter Valley’s renowned wine region with a stay at this cosy retreat. Be enveloped by a world of countryside charm at this unique escape, home to 60 beautifully appointed studio accommodations, each with breathtaking views of the vine-laced landscape and towering Broken Back Range.

Wandering kangaroos, singing kookaburras and mountains as far as the eye can see are some of the attractions that make this sanctuary, just two hours from Sydney, such a special escape to reconnect, recharge and relax. Fine wine and relaxation devotees will fall head over heels for this gorgeous rural sojourn amid the world-famous Hunter Valley wine country.

Less than five minutes down the road, guests can find Bimbagden Winery, home to award-winning dining at onsite Esca restaurant, Bimbadgen Pizzeria and Bimbadgen Cellar Door. Sitting on 37 acres of expansive vineyard and native bushland, with a tranquil outdoor pool and The Lane Pantry offering a selection of gourmet provisions, The Lane Retreat is your gateway to the quintessential Hunter Valley experience, where comfort meets the authentic Australian countryside.
offer_address: 409 Palmers Lane, Pokolbin, New South Wales 2320, Australia

title: Relaxing Hunter Valley Wine Region Studio & Apartment Stay with Tempus Two Vineyard Tasting & Welcome Bottle of Wine
description:
Embrace relaxation in one of Australia's major wine regions, the Hunter Valley, known for its sprawling vineyards and delicate wines. Settle into a glass of homegrown wine and enjoy a relaxing vacation filled with cellar-door visits in a serene spot, nestled amidst 25 acres of lush greenery.

Each room features a spa bath and a spacious outdoor patio, the perfect place to enjoy the region's breathtaking serenity as the sun dips beneath the horizon. With a wine-tasting experience at Tempus Two, a welcome bottle of local house wine to enjoy in the privacy of your cosy room and a leisurely guaranteed 12pm late checkout, there's no better reason to visit the vineyards.
offer_address: 485 McDonalds Road, Pokolbin, New South Wales 2320, Australia

title: Hunter Valley Studio & Apartment Stay with Tempus Two Wines Tasting
description:
Experience the beauty of Australia’s Hunter Valley, famous for its rolling vineyards and exceptional wines. Relax with a glass of local wine and enjoy a getaway surrounded by 25 acres of greenery near the lush Hunter Valley Gardens.

Each room features a spa bathtub and private terrace, perfect for taking in sunset views. Make the most of your stay with a wine-tasting session at Tempus Two and a complimentary bottle of house wine in your room on arrival.
offer_address: 485 McDonalds Road, Pokolbin, New South Wales 2320, Australia

title: Peaceful Hunter Valley Studio & Villa Retreat with Cellar Door Tastings
description:
Tucked away in the Hunter Valley, this retreat is surrounded by endless vineyards, swaying olive groves and sun-kissed hills that stretch as far as the eye can see. Beyond the landscape, this hotel boasts a range of country-style accommodations, including one- and two-bedroom villas and studios, presenting a premier chill-out zone for wine lovers and relaxation seekers alike.

H Boutique Hotel sets the stage for a memorable escape. Float high above the ground in a hot air balloon at sunrise, saddle up for a horseback escapade through luscious terrain or enjoy local gourmet meal options that are perfectly paired with local wines. Your opportunity to discover the birthplace of Australian wines is just a click away.
offer_address: 770 McDonalds Road, Pokolbin, New South Wales 2320, Australia

title: Relaxing Hunter Valley Wine Region Stay
description:
Embrace relaxation at Leisure Inn Pokolbin Hill, situated in one of Australia's major wine regions, the Hunter Valley. Swap your cup of coffee for a glass of wine and enjoy a relaxing vacation filled with vineyard visits in a serene spot, nestled amidst 25 acres of lush greenery.

Each room is fitted with a spa bath, ensuring the ultimate indulgence. Your escape includes a tour for two of Tyrrell’s Wines historic winery, complimentary tennis court hire, guaranteed late checkout at 11 am, complimentary Wi-Fi and a 10% discount at Andante Brasserie.
offer_address: 485 McDonalds Road, Pokolbin, New South Wales 2320, Australia

offer_address: Mistletoe Ln & Hermitage Rd, Pokolbin NSW 2320

title: Grand Opening: Hunter Valley Villa Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Cellar Door Tastings & Winery Credit
description:
Revel in the splendour of the Hunter Valley's renowned wine region with a stay at brand new The Lane Retreat. Be enveloped by a world of countryside charm at this unique escape, home to 60 beautifully appointed studio accommodations, each with breathtaking views of the vine-laced mountains and towering Broken Back Range. Wandering kangaroos, singing kookaburras and mountains as far as the eye can see are some of the attractions that make this sanctuary, just two hours from Sydney, such a special escape to reconnect, recharge and relax.

Fine wine and relaxation devotees will fall head over heels for this gorgeous rural sojourn amid the world-famous Hunter Valley River wine country. Less than five minutes down the road, guests can find Bimbagden Winery, home to award-winning dining at onsite Esca restaurant, Bimbadgen Pizzeria and Bimbadgen Cellar Door. Sitting on 37 acres of manicured gardens and native bushland, a tranquil outdoor pool and an expansive vineyard, The Lane Retreat is your gateway to the quintessential Hunter Valley experience, where comfort meets the authentic Australian countryside.

Embrace the serenity of the Hunter Valley’s renowned wine region with a stay at this cosy retreat. Be enveloped by a world of countryside charm at this unique escape, home to 60 beautifully appointed studios, each with breathtaking views of the vine-laced landscape and towering Broken Back Range.

title: Romantic Five-Star Oasis in the Heart of The Hunter Valley
description: Discover the true meaning of serenity at the breathtaking modern farmhouse estate of Spicers Guesthouse, in the Hunter Valley. The property is perfectly located in the heart of this exceptional wine region, bringing together the joys of wine tasting and total relaxation. Luxuriate in the gorgeous guesthouse, designed with rustic country charm, take a dip in the stunning pool and dine at éRemo Restaurant, passionately serving authentic Italian cuisine.

title: Sophisticated Stay in the Hunter Valley Gardens near Award-Winning Wineries
description:
Escape to this Hunter Valley retreat, where endless clear skies meet rolling vineyards, stretching like a patchwork quilt over the land. Here, you’ll be just steps away from the region’s picturesque gardens, world-class cellar doors and fine-dining restaurants.

While the location draws visitors in, this hotel’s sporty-chic pool, sauna, spa and tennis courts ensure that they’ll want to linger. The onsite European-inspired eatery éléments Bar & Dining offers refined yet casual experience set against a backdrop of lush greenery.
offer_address: Corner of Broke and McDonalds Road, Pokolbin, New South Wales 2320, Australia
